name: Doki Doki Youtuber Club
storyline: This is a short comic mod about the Dokis (and the MC) becoming YouTubers because Monika wants to try something new. Well, literature is out, and being a Youtuber is in fashion.
summary: Doki Doki: Youtuber Club is a mod for Doki Doki Literature Club! that takes the game's universe in a fun new direction, combining the original atmosphere with the world of social media and content creation. In this mod, the girls in the literature club are not just ordinary students - they are digital influencers with their own YouTube channels, each with a unique style and theme.
